betterquesting:10.desc:8:
If you somehow haven't noticed but you can't break logs with your fist and you won't be able to until you make a flint axe.
§6
Breaking leaves on trees will yeild sticks and saplings.

Gravel will yeild some flint.

Hitting flint on stone will produce flint shards.§f

To complete this quest simply collect some Gravel, Flint and sticks.
